mapper.select: SELECT member_id as id, houseinfo_aptcode as aptcode, apartmentname, concat(d.sidoName, ' ', d.gugunName, ' ', d.dongName) as address FROM user_houseinfo uh inner join houseinfo h on uh.houseinfo_aptcode = h.aptcode inner join dongcode d on h.dongcode = d.dongcode where member_id = #{id} and flag = true
